t: Double the speed: New Amazon facility coming to Redmond will make your deliveries faster - KTVZ
s: 3 weeks ago - Located off East Antler Avenue, the Amazon facility will bring an estimated 170 jobs to the area. Matt Eartle, president of Pridestaff in Bend, says they expect to be busy when the facility hires: "This is a big deal. Also, in the city of Redmond, there are approximately 30,000 jobs.
